name: retroverted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a body part) sloping backwards: retroverted uterus In most cases, a retroverted uterus doesn't interfere with pregnancy. Of the 195 hips operated on, 53% of the hip sockets were anteverted, 42% retroverted, and 5% had neutral orientations. Compare
antevertedRelated word
retroversion
More examplesFewer examplesIf you are one of the 15%–20% of women who has a retroverted uterus, this diagram shows a cross-section of what it looks like.Complications may arise if the uterus is tipped back towards the spine (retroverted).Coral snakes have retroverted teeth which gnaw or chew on their prey, making them difficult to shake off.
